text: No they won't, and that's very telling right there.
That line about doing the right thing is hard, but it's worth it.
In his mind, doing the right thing is being nice.

Doing the right thing is passing the legislation that people need in this country and that you ran on and that people who, even if they even took your campaign even one-tenth seriously, when they pulled that lever, that you've pissed all over.
It's not being *nice* to the fucking Republicans or *not* being like Trump because you know what other cavete is, what it said about Trump there, he gets to keep power?
